title: Thank you for giving us Kha'zix back
body: As a huge fan of Kha'zix in early season 4, I was a little worried about the series of nerfs and buffs that the bug got over the course of the season. And I just wanted to let Riot and the community know that I am very pleased with where he ended up. He's a fun and satisfying champion to play, and his personality and theme are well-designed and well-implemented in his kit. I realize there still may be some work do be done (like making R a good evolution choice, and maybe some power tuning), and I don't know how he'll do in the new jungle, but overall I'm happy to see him in a healthy, fun, and competitive place. Thanks Riot!

> Wth.. They didn't buff him.  They nerfed his void spikes some

They didn't mash him into a gooey paste after zapping him with an electric fly-swatter either.

Riot has a pretty long history of blasting assassins into Evelynn tier when they have a decent showing in competitive play. Like Evelynn, that was nerffed so hard she got garbage tier nammed after her for a few years.
Rengar was nerffed into no-mans land (until his triple Q was discovered and widely used, then he was nerffed again). LeBlanc was nerffed pretty hard despite having one of the worst win-rates when she did get popular, Kassadin was finally nerffed pretty harshly, Diana fell pretty far from where she started, Yasou just took a pretty big nerf, and Talon even took a noticeable nerf despite never actually being a top-rate pick.

Kha'Zix, Zed, Fizz, and Lee Sin are about the only assassins that have really evaded that thus far. Fizz actually got a buff to compensate for a Lich Bane nerf.

Kinda surprised Fizz hasn't gotten hit that hard, but Zed seems like the poster-child of what Riot wants an assassin to be, and for whatever reason they seem to be committed to tweaking Kha'Zix into a healthy spot with love-tap nerfs rather than overnerffing him.

--------------

Kind of didn't expect Kha'Zix to remain relevant up to Worlds, but he maintained being a really solid jungler for the entire season and arguably one of the 3 strongest assassins in the game.

I'd say top 5, Rengar being top 3.  But I see where you guys are going.  But I was more so replying to OP about his statement, but after re-reading it, I misinterpreted it.
